<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Rename independent subregisters looks for virtual registers with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// independently used subregisters and renames them to new virtual registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Example: In the following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   %0:sub0&lt;read-undef&gt; = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   %0:sub1 = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   use %0:sub0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   %0:sub0 = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   use %0:sub0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   use %0:sub1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// sub0 and sub1 are never used together, and we have two independent sub0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// definitions. This pass will rename to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   %0:sub0&lt;read-undef&gt; = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   %1:sub1&lt;read-undef&gt; = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   use %1:sub1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   %2:sub1&lt;read-undef&gt; = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   use %2:sub1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   use %0:sub0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"></CodeLine>
